1: -module(mnesia_external_backend_test).
    2: 
    3: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
    4:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
    5:          suite/0, all/0, groups/0]).
    6: 
    7: -export([
    8:     conversion_from_external_to_disc_copies_results_in_data_loss_after_node_restart/1,
    9:     backup_and_restore_fails_with_external_backend/1
   10: ]).
   11: 
   12: -include("mnesia_test_lib.hrl").
   13: -include_lib("stdlib/include/ms_transform.hrl").
   14: 
   15: -record(some_rec, {some_id :: atom(), some_int :: number(), some_string :: string()}).
   16: 
   17: -define(acquire(N, Config),
   18:         mnesia_test_lib:prepare_test_case([{init_test_case, [mnesia]},
   19:                                            delete_schema],
   20:                                           N, Config, ?FILE, ?LINE)).
   21: 
   22: all() -> [
   23:     backup_and_restore_fails_with_external_backend
   24: ].
   25: 
   26: groups() ->
   27:     [].
   28: 
   29: init_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   30:     file:delete(ext_test_server:tab_to_filename(table)),
   31:     file:delete("bup0.BUP"),
   32:     file:delete("bup1.BUP"),
   33:     file:delete("bup2.BUP"),
   34:     {ok, _} = gen_server:start_link({local, ext_test_server}, ext_test_server, [self()],
   35:                                [{timeout, infinity}
   36:                                 %%, {debug, [trace]}
   37:                                ]),
   38:     mnesia_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Func, Conf).
   39: 
   40: end_per_testcase(Func, Conf) ->
   41:     mnesia_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Func, Conf),
   42:     ok = gen_server:stop(ext_test_server).
   43: 
   44: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   45:     Config.
   46: 
   47: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   48:     Config.
   49: 
   50: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[{ts_install_cth,[{nodenames,1}]}]}].
   51: 
   52: conversion_from_external_to_disc_copies_results_in_data_loss_after_node_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   53:     Node = node(),
   54:     Data = [
   55:         #some_rec{some_id = a, some_int = 1, some_string = "something" },
   56:         #some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "anything"  },
   57:         #some_rec{some_id = c, some_int = 3, some_string = "everything"},
   58:         #some_rec{some_id = d, some_int = 4, some_string = "nothing"   }
   59:     ],
   60: 
   61:     [Node] = ?acquire(1, Config),
   62:     ok = mnesia:create_schema([Node]),
   63:     ok = mnesia:start(),
   64:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:add_backend_type(ext_ets, ext_test),
   65:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:add_backend_type(ext_dets, ext_test),
   66:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:create_table(table, [
   67:         {type, ordered_set},
   68:         {record_name, some_rec},
   69:         {attributes, record_info(fields, some_rec)},
   70:         {disc_copies, [Node]}
   71:     ]),
   72: 
   73:     ok = mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   74:         lists:foreach(fun(Elem) -> mnesia:write(table, Elem, write) end, Data)
   75:     end),
   76: 
   77:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:change_table_copy_type(table, Node, ext_ets),
   78:     Data = mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   79:         mnesia:match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}, read) end
   80:     ),
   81: 
   82:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:change_table_copy_type(table, Node, disc_copies),
   83:     Data = mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   84:         mnesia:match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}, read) end
   85:     ),
   86: 
   87:     stopped = mnesia:stop(),
   88:     ok = mnesia:start(),
   89:     ok = mnesia:wait_for_tables([schema, table], 10000),
   90: 
   91:     Data = mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
   92:         mnesia:match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}, read) end
   93:     ).
   94: 
   95: backup_and_restore_fails_with_external_backend(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   96:     Node = node(),
   97:     Data1 = [
   98:         #some_rec{some_id = a, some_int = 1, some_string = "1"},
   99:         #some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "2"},
  100:         #some_rec{some_id = c, some_int = 3, some_string = "3"}
  101:     ],
  102:     Data2 = [
  103:         #some_rec{some_id = d, some_int = 4, some_string = "4"},
  104:         #some_rec{some_id = e, some_int = 5, some_string = "5"},
  105:         #some_rec{some_id = f, some_int = 6, some_string = "6"}
  106:     ],
  107: 
  108:     [Node] = ?acquire_nodes(1, Config),
  109:     ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:create_table(table, [
  110:         {type, set},
  111:         {record_name, some_rec},
  112:         {attributes, record_info(fields, some_rec)},
  113:         {ext_disc_only_copies, [Node]}
  114:     ])),
  115: 
  116:     % ?match({atomic, ok}, mnesia:add_table_index(table, #some_rec.some_int)).
  117:     ?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'})),
  118:     % ?match(ok, mnesia:backup("bup0.BUP")),
  119: 
  120:     ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
  121:         lists:foreach(fun(Elem) -> mnesia:write(table, Elem, write) end, Data1)
  122:     end)),
  123:     ?match(ok, mnesia:backup("bup1.BUP")),
  124: 
  125:     % ?match(ok, mnesia:activity(transaction, fun() ->
  126:     %     lists:foreach(fun(Elem) -> mnesia:write(table, Elem, write) end, Data2)
  127:     % end)),
  128:     % ?match(ok, mnesia:backup("bup2.BUP")),
  129: 
  130:     % ?match(true, ets:whereis(table) =/= undefined),
  131:     % ?match(ok, load_backup("bup0.BUP")).
  132:     % ?match(true, ets:whereis(table) =/= undefined),
  133:     % ?match([], mnesia:dirty_match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'})).
  134:     % [] = mnesia:dirty_index_read(table, 2, #some_rec.some_int),
  135: 
  136:     ?match(ok, load_backup("bup1.BUP")),
  137:     Expected1 = sets:from_list(Data1),
  138:     ?match(Expected1, sets:from_list(mnesia:dirty_match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}))).
  139:     % [#some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "2"}] = mnesia:dirty_index_read(table, 2, #some_rec.some_int),
  140: 
  141:     % ?match(ok, load_backup("bup2.BUP")),
  142:     % Expected2 = sets:from_list(lists:append(Data1, Data2)),
  143:     % ?match(Expected2, sets:from_list(mnesia:dirty_match_object(table, #some_rec{_ = '_'}))).
  144:     % [#some_rec{some_id = b, some_int = 2, some_string = "2"}] = mnesia:dirty_index_read(table, 2, #some_rec.some_int),
  145:     % [#some_rec{some_id = e, some_int = 5, some_string = "5"}] = mnesia:dirty_index_read(table, 5, #some_rec.some_int).
  146: 
  147: load_backup(BUP) ->
  148:     ok = mnesia:install_fallback(BUP),
  149:     stopped = mnesia:stop(),
  150:     timer:sleep(3000),
  151:     ok = mnesia:start(),
  152:     ok = mnesia:wait_for_tables([schema, table], 5000).
